description: Liquid Argon, Rental, Installation and Maintenance services of one (1) contractor owned storage tank

---

### Invitation to Tender - Amendment No 2

#### Solicitation Number: WS4669843791

**Services Provided:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada invites interested contractors to participate in a competitive bidding process for the supply of Liquid Argon, Rental, Installation and Maintenance services of one contractor-owned storage tank.

**Notice Details:**

* Publication Date: July 4, 2024
* Closing Date: August 14, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
* Contract Duration: Expected to begin on December 12, 2024, and conclude on November 3, 2027.

**Bid Submission Requirements:**

Read More: [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20223031?extsite=MjAyMjMwMzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Important: Bids Submissions Must be Received by August 14, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST.

### Awarding Entity:

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
Canada.

### Point of Contact:

Nicole Zimmerling (she/her)
nicole.zimmerling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Note:

1-The regions of delivery are limited to Ottawa, Ontario.

2-Solicitation Number WS4669843791, changes and updates will be announced on Ariba Discovery.

3- Awarded contract following lowest price criteria

4- Services to be delivered in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
